column4: can someone tell me how I can remove the 'wired connection' icon from my panel?  I've right-clicked but there is no option to remove from panel
this is a stab in the dark, but; have you tried clicking the icon to open the app then using it's menu to quit said app ?
I'm a 3 day old linux user....can I do that without dropping my connection?
i whish i knew.  1) i'm still using dapper drake 6.6  2) i don't like gnome   3) i'm a console user that rarely starts a guy at all...   ;/
